summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of several Ansible action plugins, including the base action class, gather_facts, raw, and reboot plugins. The tests cover execution helpers, environment handling, module configuration, temporary file management, remote file operations, permission changes, data transfer, sudo behavior, result copying, and error handling for connection failures.
business_intent: Provide automated validation to ensure Ansible action plugins work correctly and remain stable across changes, helping maintain high quality and reliability of the automation platform.
